description:
Learn to crochet by making these fun Christmas projects. The crochet along videos are designed to allow anyone from beginners to advanced students to crochet along with me to make these awesome Christmas gifts ornaments and more. Crochet is fun. Come join us!

In these crochet along videos you will see how easy crochet really is and once you get started you'll be hooked!

Learn to cast on, crochet different stitches and learn while making these awesome Christmas gifts, ornaments and table decorations.

Crochet is easy and it is easy enough for adults and kids alike. It is also great for stress and really, it's just a lot of fun for everyone.

This course will show you how to:

  • Crochet from scratch
  • How to crochet a magic circle
  • How to cast on using chain crochet stitch
  • How to crochet single crochet stitches easily
  • It includes free crochet patterns for Christmas Elf slipper
  • Free patter for Snowflakes
  • Free pattern for Christmas ornaments
title: Crochet for Beginners: Christmas Crochet
